infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: Homebase uses your calendar to display the events you choose inside the app and help you plan your day (for example, showing upcoming appointments, school drop-offs, and family activities alongside your tasks). Homebase only reads calendar event details to show them in your schedule view.
infoPlist.NSCalendarsFullAccessUsageDescription: Homebase uses your calendar to display the events you choose inside the app and help you plan your day (for example, showing upcoming appointments, school drop-offs, and family activities alongside your tasks). Homebase only reads calendar event details to show them in your schedule view.
infoPlist.NSCalendarsWriteOnlyAccessUsageDescripti: Homebase uses calendar write access only when you choose to add or update an event from within the app (for example, adding a family activity or appointment from your planning screen).
infoPlist.NSRemindersUsageDescription: Homebase uses reminders to sync your to-dos into the app (for example: groceries, pickups, and recurring household tasks) so you can manage everything from your dashboard.
